Episodes.Title: It's Alive!
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Daniel Cerone
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: In the Season Two premiere, Dexter finds himself unable to kill again after the harrowing conclusion to the Ice Truck Killer case, and strays from his personal code with disastrous results; Debra returns to work but may not be ready.

Episodes.Title: Waiting to Exhale
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Clyde Phillips
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter remains on the trail of a dangerous new victim, while the traumatized Debra loses control on the job and a high-profile FBI agent arrives in Miami to investigate a newly discovered serial killer.

Episodes.Title: An Inconvenient Lie
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Melissa Rosenberg
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter's inability to deceive has him pursuing a slick liar as his next victim, while Rita believes he's concealing a drug problem and forces him into a 12-step program where he meets Lila, a seductive new woman.

Episodes.Title: See-Through
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Scott Buck
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Rita finds herself threatened by Dexter's sexy new NA sponsor Lila, and stressed by a visit from her estranged mother, while Dexter tries to throw the dogged FBI Agent Lundy off his bloody trail.

Episodes.Title: The Dark Defender
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Tim Schlattmann
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter discovers that the man who murdered his mother in front of him as a boy is still alive and confronts the killer as part of his recovery from addiction - but he also discovers that old impulses die hard.

Episodes.Title: Dex, Lies, and Videotape
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Lauren Gussis
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: A new copycat killer openly mimics and claims to be inspired by the "Bay Harbor Butcher," driving the annoyed Dexter into the arms of Lila, a development that could spell the end of his relationship with Rita.

Episodes.Title: That Night, a Forest Grew
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Daniel Cerone
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: A written manifesto from the "Bay Harbor Butcher" sends the task force in charge of capturing him into chaos, which is part of Dexter's plan for keeping Lundy off his trail.

Episodes.Title: Morning Comes
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Scott Buck
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter decides that Lila is becoming too attached, decides "recovery" isn't working for him, and pays another visit to his mother's killer; Debra and Lundy find a clue that points to the "Bay Harbor Butcher" being right under thei...

Episodes.Title: Resistance Is Futile
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Melissa Rosenberg
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter tries to distance himself from Lila, but discovers she is unwilling to let go of their relationship; Lundy's manhunt makes Dexter nervous as he tries to stay one step ahead - but it's Dexter's worst enemy that learns his se...

Episodes.Title: There's Something About Harry
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Scott Reynolds
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter's world comes crumbling down when Doakes tracks him to the scene of his latest kill and reveals a devastating secret about Harry; the Miami Metro PD closes in on the "Bay Harbor Butcher."

Episodes.Title: Left Turn Ahead
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Scott Buck
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter dodges bullets both figurative and real as he is forced to decide the fates of those he cares about most; Lila attempts to blackmail Dexter and makes a startling discovery.

Episodes.Title: The British Invasion
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Daniel Cerone
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: In the Season Two finale, Lundy and the FBI finally settle the case of the Bay Harbor Butcher, but the heat's not entirely off Dexter as his world literally becomes an inferno. Can he rise from the ashes once again?
